price: ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲߫ ߕߍ߫ ߒߠߋ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲ߘߐߓߊ߯ ߞߙߎ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏߢߊ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߢߐ߲߯ ߛߐߛߐ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
